creditline: Gift of James C. and Kathryn L. Hogan
description: square grey card with image on front printed in green; silhouettes of Santa Claus with three tiny figures; line drawing of village houses and church and crescent moon in background
object_name: Christmas card with Santa Claus and three figures in silhouette
provenance: The artist; his stepson, Jim Hogan, Hudson, Wis.
title: Christmas card with Santa Claus and three figures in silhouette
